projects.title: Web Dev Essentials
projects.description: A comprehensive repo I designed to consolidate my foundations for web development, it looks at ES6 syntax deeper which helped me better understand JavaScript. I also looked at using webpack and revisiting CSS specific styles/libraries as well as semantic HTML elements.
